participant_1.name: Jessie Carter
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate, Jessie loves to express herself through music and enjoys the beauty of nature.
participant_1.background: i grew up in the industry. i am a country music singer. my favorite band is rascal flats. i started playing guitar when i was three. we spent summers ring at national parks.

participant_2.name: Liam Johnson
participant_2.personality: Friendly and easygoing, Liam enjoys spending time with his family and pets, and he has a soft spot for sports.
participant_2.background: i enjoy coloring books. my husband is adopted. i've a german shepherd dog. i like to watch nhl hockey. i live is a rural farming community.
